foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort blanc, bleu, noir ou rouge, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur la Dryade quirionaise.

foreignData.name: クウィリーオンのドライアド

name: Quirion Dryad
originalText: Whenever you play a white, blue, black, or red spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Quirion Dryad.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when a player casts a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
If you cast a spell that's more than one color, Quirion Dryad's ability triggers just once.

text: Whenever you cast a spell that's white, blue, black, or red, put a +1/+1 counter on Quirion Dryad.
